summary: This document is a series of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 5, 2019. It includes inmate count sheets, an out-count form, and an inmate roster for the hospital unit, reflecting standard prison operations on the day Jeffrey Epstein died.

persons.name: Gama-Pineda
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the hospital unit roster with registration number 85918-054.

persons.name: Torres
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the hospital unit roster with registration number 85621-054.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts at MCC New York
events.description: Standard administrative inmate counts and out-count procedures were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 5, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide in the MCC.
The records show standard prison operations, including inmate counts and a hospital unit roster.
Two inmates, Gama-Pineda and Torres, are specifically named on the hospital unit roster.
The forms are administrative and do not contain direct references to Epstein, his case, or the circumstances of his death.
The documents provide context for the prison's routine procedures on the day of a major event in the Epstein case.
